snippet: The case of a Pomeranian dropped off at a family member’s apartment highlighted the long-running battle between tenants and landlords over lease stipulations regarding pets.
abstract: Bronx housing court Judge Javier E Vargas rules that local family did not violate terms of their apartment lease by allowing visits by relative's dog; lease prohibits keeping dogs full time.
lead_paragraph: The case of a Pomeranian dropped off at a family member’s apartment highlighted the long-running battle between tenants and landlords over lease stipulations regarding pets.

headline.main: Judge Rules That a Dog Visiting a Bronx Apartment Is Not an Illegal Tenant
headline.print_headline: Judge Says Dog’s Visits Don’t Violate the Lease
